text: – Improved crossings of the railway lines in the north of the site – Enhancements to public realm and Allen Gardens z The site is in multiple ownership and consists of a number of fragmented sites with opportunities for redevelopment, and landowners and developers should work together with the council to implement a comprehensive design-led masterplan for redevelopment of this site, to ensure development is delivered sustainably. Effective engagement between landowners, developers and leaseholders will be needed to facilitate potential land assembly and comprehensive redevelopment. z New employment spaces delivered on this site must include a majority of spaces that are suitable for small-scale local businesses that will serve the local community.
